## About

This R Shiny application is being developed to apply **Bayesian predictive probability** approach to design and interim monitoring in clinical trials.

Under development, more details to add.

Authors: Kai Ding and Mani Lakshminarayanan <br>


## Reference
Lee J, Liu D. A predictive probability design for phase II cancer clinical trials. Clin Trials. 2008; 5(2): 93-106.<br>
Dmitrienko A, Wang M. Bayesian predictive approach to interim monitoring in clinical trials. Statist. Med. 2006; 25:2178-2195.
